basicInformation.name: Venkata Gopi M
basicInformation.d: Having 3+ years of experience in training students in engineering colleges throughout Andhra Pradesh on various technologies. Involved in knowledge sharing and knowledge transfer to the new members of the team & Preparation of knowledge transfer documents. Trained approximately 4000 students so far in short term & long term training programs. Got consistent & good feedback from every training program
